text: Luis Garisto Pan (3 December 1945 â€“ 21 November 2017) was a Uruguayan football (soccer) coach who had a professional career as both player and head coach. He was born in Montevideo. He played for Uruguay's national football team. He coached Deportivo Toluca and for Atlas. Garisto died in Montevideo on 21 November 2017 of respiratory failure at the age of 71. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile at MedioTiempo Category:1945 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Uruguay Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Uruguayan football managers Category:Footballers from Montevideo
title: Luis Garisto
